mapper.select: SELECT a.name as name, a.type as type, a.status as status, a.iam_id as iam_id, r.name as role_name, r.role_id as role_id FROM pm_account a LEFT JOIN pm_account_role ar on a.id = ar.account_id LEFT JOIN pm_role r on r.id = ar.role_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pm_account (name, iam_id, status, type, last_login, employee_number) VALUES (#{account.name}, #{account.iamId}, #{account.status}, #{account.type}, #{account.lastLogin}, #{account.employeeNumber})
mapper.update: UPDATE pm_account SET status = (#{request.status}) WHERE name = (#{request.name})
